mapper.sql: cpy.cpy_name AS cpyName, cpy.cpy_telephone AS cpyTelephone, cpy.cpy_brand AS cpyBrand, ccp.cbs_operator AS ccpName, ccp.cbs_operator_phone AS ccpTelephone, cpy.cpy_email AS ccpEmail, ccp.cbs_operator_qq AS ccpQq

id, hdl_code AS hdlCode, hdl_name AS hdlName, hdl_english AS hdlEnglish, hdl_keyword AS hdlKeyword, hdl_province AS hdlProvince, hdl_city AS hdlCity, hdl_county AS hdlCounty, hdl_address AS hdlAddress, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude, hdl_telephone AS hdlTelephone, hdl_is_cz AS hdlChuanzhen, hdl_level AS hdlLevel, hdl_room_num AS hdlRoomNum, hdl_is_start AS hdlStart, hdl_renovation_date AS hdlRenovationDate, hdl_characteristic AS hdlCharacteristic, hdl_facilities AS hdlFacilities, hdl_network AS hdlNetWork, hdl_service AS hdlService, hdl_creditcard AS hdlCreditcard, hdl_position AS hdlPosition, hdl_district AS hdlDistrict, hdl_near_site AS hdlNearSite, hdl_mark AS hdlMark, hdl_feature AS hdlFeature, hdl_describe AS hdlDescribe, hdl_img1 AS hdlImg1, hdl_img2 AS hdlImg2, hdl_img3 AS hdlImg3, hdl_img4 AS hdlImg4, hdl_img5 AS hdlImg5, hdl_createtime AS hdlCreatetime, hdl_createuser AS hdlCreateuser, hdl_is_del_status AS hdlIsDelStatus, hdl_ctmc AS hdlCtmc, hdl_ctlx AS hdlCtlx, hdl_ctmj AS hdlCtmj, hdl_ctnum_sta AS hdlCtnumSta, hdl_ctnum AS hdlCtnum, hdl_img6 AS hdlImg6, hdl_textpname AS hdlTextpName, hdl_textlx AS hdlTextLx, hdl_textmj AS hdlTextmj, hdl_textnum AS hdlTextNum, hdl_textmony AS hdlTextmony, hdl_img7 AS hdlImg7, hdl_is_internal AS hdlIsInternal, hdl_external AS hdlExternal, hdl_foreign AS hdlForeign, hdl_foreign_city AS hdlForeignCity, hdl_location AS hdlLocation, hdl_scheduled AS hdlScheduled
mapper.select:
SELECT
, (SELECT code_value FROM tm_system_code WHERE code_id = 'C022' AND code_key = hdl_level) dicLevel , (SELECT region_name FROM tm_system_region WHERE region_pid = '0' AND region_id = hdl_province) dicCity FROM hotel_detail
ORDER BY hdl_is_del_status DESC, hdl_createtime DESC

SELECT town.* FROM ( SELECT hotel.id AS id, hdl_code AS hdlCode, hdl_name AS hdlName, hdl_english AS hdlEnglish, hdl_keyword AS hdlKeyword, hdl_province AS hdlProvince, hdl_city AS hdlCity, hdl_county AS hdlCounty, hdl_address AS hdlAddress, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude, hdl_telephone AS hdlTelephone, hdl_is_cz AS hdlChuanzhen, hdl_level AS hdlLevel, hdl_room_num AS hdlRoomNum, hdl_is_start AS hdlStart, hdl_renovation_date AS hdlRenovationDate, hdl_characteristic AS hdlCharacteristic, hdl_facilities AS hdlFacilities, hdl_network AS hdlNetWork, hdl_service AS hdlService, hdl_creditcard AS hdlCreditcard, hdl_position AS hdlPosition, hdl_district AS hdlDistrict, hdl_near_site AS hdlNearSite, hdl_mark AS hdlMark, hdl_feature AS hdlFeature, hdl_describe AS hdlDescribe, hdl_img1 AS hdlImg1, hdl_img2 AS hdlImg2, hdl_img3 AS hdlImg3, hdl_img4 AS hdlImg4, hdl_img5 AS hdlImg5, hdl_createtime AS hdlCreatetime, hdl_createuser AS hdlCreateuser, hdl_is_del_status AS hdlIsDelStatus, hdl_ctmc AS hdlCtmc, hdl_ctlx AS hdlCtlx, hdl_ctmj AS hdlCtmj, hdl_ctnum_sta AS hdlCtnumSta, hdl_ctnum AS hdlCtnum, hdl_img6 AS hdlImg6, hdl_textpname AS hdlTextpName, hdl_textlx AS hdlTextLx, hdl_textmj AS hdlTextmj, hdl_textnum AS hdlTextNum, hdl_textmony AS hdlTextmony, hdl_img7 AS hdlImg7, hdl_is_internal AS hdlIsInternal, hdl_external AS hdlExternal, hdl_foreign AS hdlForeign, hdl_foreign_city AS hdlForeignCity, hdl_location AS hdlLocation,
(SELECT a.hnp_trade_price FROM ( SELECT hdl_id, hhe_id, hnp_trade_price FROM hotel_room_price WHERE hnp_date = #{hnpDate} AND hnp_is_open = '02' ORDER BY hrp_createtime DESC ) a WHERE a.hdl_id = hotel.id GROUP BY a.hhe_id ORDER BY a.hnp_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS hnpTradePrice, (SELECT a.hnp_sign FROM ( SELECT hdl_id, hhe_id, hnp_sign, hnp_trade_price FROM hotel_room_price WHERE hnp_date = #{hnpDate} AND hnp_is_open = '02' ORDER BY hrp_createtime DESC ) a WHERE a.hdl_id = hotel.id GROUP BY a.hhe_id ORDER BY a.hnp_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS hnpSign,
(SELECT a.hhe_id FROM ( SELECT hdl_id, hhe_id, hnp_sign, hnp_trade_price FROM hotel_room_price WHERE hnp_date = #{hnpDate} AND hnp_is_open = '02' ORDER BY hrp_createtime DESC ) a WHERE a.hdl_id = hotel.id GROUP BY a.hhe_id ORDER BY a.hnp_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS hheId,
hdl_scheduled AS hdlScheduled,
FROM hotel_detail hotel LEFT JOIN company_detail cpy ON hotel.cpy_id = cpy.id LEFT JOIN company_business ccp on ccp.cpy_id = hotel.cpy_id WHERE hdl_is_del_status = '02' AND hotel.id in ( select st.cid from pub_sametown st where st.cpyid_from != #{cpyId} and st.cpyid_to = #{cpyId} and st.ntype = 'HOTEL' ) AND
) town WHERE town.hnpTradePrice IS NOT NULL ORDER BY town.hnpSign DESC

SELECT count(1) FROM hotel_detail hotel WHERE hdl_is_del_status = '02' AND hotel.id in ( select st.cid from pub_sametown st where st.cpyid_from != #{cpyId} and st.cpyid_to = #{cpyId} and st.ntype = 'HOTEL' )

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT hotel.id AS id, hdl_code AS hdlCode, hdl_name AS hdlName, hdl_english AS hdlEnglish, hdl_keyword AS hdlKeyword, hdl_province AS hdlProvince, hdl_city AS hdlCity, hdl_county AS hdlCounty, hdl_address AS hdlAddress, longitude AS longitude, latitude AS latitude, hdl_telephone AS hdlTelephone, hdl_is_cz AS hdlChuanzhen, hdl_level AS hdlLevel, hdl_room_num AS hdlRoomNum, hdl_is_start AS hdlStart, hdl_renovation_date AS hdlRenovationDate, hdl_characteristic AS hdlCharacteristic, hdl_facilities AS hdlFacilities, hdl_network AS hdlNetWork, hdl_service AS hdlService, hdl_creditcard AS hdlCreditcard, hdl_position AS hdlPosition, hdl_district AS hdlDistrict, hdl_near_site AS hdlNearSite, hdl_mark AS hdlMark, hdl_feature AS hdlFeature, hdl_describe AS hdlDescribe, hdl_img1 AS hdlImg1, hdl_img2 AS hdlImg2, hdl_img3 AS hdlImg3, hdl_img4 AS hdlImg4, hdl_img5 AS hdlImg5, hdl_createtime AS hdlCreatetime, hdl_createuser AS hdlCreateuser, hdl_is_del_status AS hdlIsDelStatus, hdl_ctmc AS hdlCtmc, hdl_ctlx AS hdlCtlx, hdl_ctmj AS hdlCtmj, hdl_ctnum_sta AS hdlCtnumSta, hdl_ctnum AS hdlCtnum, hdl_img6 AS hdlImg6, hdl_textpname AS hdlTextpName, hdl_textlx AS hdlTextLx, hdl_textmj AS hdlTextmj, hdl_textnum AS hdlTextNum, hdl_textmony AS hdlTextmony, hdl_img7 AS hdlImg7, hdl_is_internal AS hdlIsInternal, hdl_external AS hdlExternal, hdl_foreign AS hdlForeign, hdl_foreign_city AS hdlForeignCity, hdl_location AS hdlLocation,
(SELECT a.hnp_trade_price FROM ( SELECT hdl_id, hhe_id, hnp_trade_price FROM hotel_room_price WHERE hnp_date = #{hnpDate} AND hnp_is_open = '02' ORDER BY hrp_createtime DESC ) a WHERE a.hdl_id = hotel.id GROUP BY a.hhe_id ORDER BY a.hnp_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS hnpTradePrice, (SELECT a.hnp_sign FROM ( SELECT hdl_id, hhe_id, hnp_sign, hnp_trade_price FROM hotel_room_price WHERE hnp_date = #{hnpDate} AND hnp_is_open = '02' ORDER BY hrp_createtime DESC ) a WHERE a.hdl_id = hotel.id GROUP BY a.hhe_id ORDER BY a.hnp_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS hnpSign,
(SELECT a.hhe_id FROM ( SELECT hdl_id, hhe_id, hnp_sign, hnp_trade_price FROM hotel_room_price WHERE hnp_date = #{hnpDate} AND hnp_is_open = '02' ORDER BY hrp_createtime DESC ) a WHERE a.hdl_id = hotel.id GROUP BY a.hhe_id ORDER BY a.hnp_trade_price LIMIT 1 ) AS hheId,
hdl_scheduled AS hdlScheduled,
FROM hotel_detail hotel LEFT JOIN company_detail cpy ON hotel.cpy_id = cpy.id LEFT JOIN company_business ccp on ccp.cpy_id = hotel.cpy_id WHERE hdl_is_del_status = '02' AND hotel.id in ( select st.cid from pub_sametown st where st.cpyid_from != #{cpyId} and st.cpyid_to = #{cpyId} and st.ntype = 'HOTEL' ) AND
) town WHERE town.hnpTradePrice IS NOT NULL AND town.hnpSign IS NOT NULL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hotel_detail ( hdl_name, hdl_english, hdl_keyword, hdl_province, hdl_city, hdl_county, hdl_address, longitude, latitude, hdl_telephone, hdl_is_cz, hdl_level, hdl_room_num, hdl_is_start, hdl_renovation_date, hdl_characteristic, hdl_facilities, hdl_network, hdl_service, hdl_creditcard, hdl_position, hdl_district, hdl_near_site, hdl_mark, hdl_feature, hdl_describe, hdl_img1, hdl_img2, hdl_img3, hdl_img4, hdl_img5, hdl_createtime, hdl_createuser, hdl_is_del_status, cpy_id, hdl_is_valid, hdl_is_internal, hdl_external, hdl_foreign, hdl_foreign_city, hdl_location ) VALUES ( #{hdlName}, #{hdlEnglish}, #{hdlKeyword}, #{hdlProvince}, #{hdlCity}, #{hdlCounty}, #{hdlAddress}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{hdlTelephone}, #{hdlChuanzhen}, #{hdlLevel}, #{hdlRoomNum}, #{hdlStart}, #{hdlRenovationDate}, #{hdlCharacteristic}, #{hdlFacilities}, #{hdlNetWork}, #{hdlService}, #{hdlCreditcard}, #{hdlPosition}, #{hdlDistrict}, #{hdlNearSite}, #{hdlMark}, #{hdlFeature}, #{hdlDescribe}, #{hdlImg1}, #{hdlImg2}, #{hdlImg3}, #{hdlImg4}, #{hdlImg5}, #{hdlCreatetime}, #{hdlCreateuser}, #{hdlIsDelStatus}, #{cpyId}, #{hdlIsValid}, #{hdlIsInternal}, #{hdlExternal}, #{hdlForeign}, #{hdlForeignCity}, #{hdlLocation} )
mapper.update: UPDATE hotel_detail SET hdl_ctmc = #{hdlCtmc}, hdl_ctlx = #{hdlCtlx}, hdl_ctmj = #{hdlCtmj}, hdl_ctnum_sta = #{hdlCtnumSta}, hdl_ctnum = #{hdlCtnum}, hdl_img6 = #{hdlImg6} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE hotel_detail SET hdl_textpname = #{hdlTextpName}, hdl_textlx = #{hdlTextLx}, hdl_textmj = #{hdlTextmj}, hdl_textnum = #{hdlTextNum}, hdl_textmony = #{hdlTextmony}, hdl_is_valid = #{hdlIsValid}, hdl_img7 = #{hdlImg7} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE hotel_detail SET hdl_name = #{hdlName}, hdl_english = #{hdlEnglish}, hdl_keyword = #{hdlKeyword}, hdl_province = #{hdlProvince}, hdl_city = #{hdlCity}, hdl_county = #{hdlCounty}, hdl_address = #{hdlAddress}, longitude = #{longitude}, latitude = #{latitude}, hdl_telephone = #{hdlTelephone}, hdl_is_cz = #{hdlChuanzhen}, hdl_level = #{hdlLevel}, hdl_room_num = #{hdlRoomNum}, hdl_is_start = #{hdlStart}, hdl_renovation_date = #{hdlRenovationDate}, hdl_characteristic = #{hdlCharacteristic}, hdl_facilities = #{hdlFacilities}, hdl_network = #{hdlNetWork}, hdl_service = #{hdlService}, hdl_creditcard = #{hdlCreditcard}, hdl_position = #{hdlPosition}, hdl_district = #{hdlDistrict}, hdl_near_site = #{hdlNearSite}, hdl_mark = #{hdlMark}, hdl_feature = #{hdlFeature}, hdl_describe = #{hdlDescribe}, hdl_img1 = #{hdlImg1}, hdl_img2 = #{hdlImg2}, hdl_img3 = #{hdlImg3}, hdl_img4 = #{hdlImg4}, hdl_img5 = #{hdlImg5}, hdl_is_internal = #{hdlIsInternal}, hdl_external = #{hdlExternal}, hdl_foreign = #{hdlForeign}, hdl_foreign_city = #{hdlForeignCity}, hdl_location = #{hdlLocation} WHERE id = #{id}
